short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open Trello board and card links in the Trello desktop app

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Trello Link Opener is an extension that runs in the background to automatically redirect Trello links to boards and cards to the native desktop app.

For example, the URL "https://trello.com/c/some-card-id" will redirect to "trello://trello.com/c/some-card-id", which uses Trello's custom URI scheme to open the card URL.

Requires the desktop version of Trello to be installed.
